rows: You and your sister share 10 bags of chips equally. How many bags of chips will each of you get?
Sarah picked 6 flowers. She put an equal amount of flowers into 2 vases. How many flowers did she put in each vase?
A farmer has 16 eggs and puts them into 2 boxes equally. How many eggs are in each box?
Shante picked 6 mangoes from a tree. He put an equal number of mangoes into 2 boxes. How many mangoes did he put in each box?
8 students were equally divided into 2 groups by the teacher. How many students are in each group?
You and your sister share 10 bags of chips equally. How many bags of chips will each of you get?
Sarah picked 6 flowers. She put an equal amount of flowers into 2 vases. How many flowers did she put in each vase?
Shante picked 6 mangoes from a tree. He put an equal number of mangoes into 2 boxes. How many mangoes did he put in each box?
